title: Received a gift from a friend, but it didn't say what it was and I don't know what I got.
body:
Hey there,

So, I received a gift from a friend "OctaviaHaunt" (not sure why she sent it to me) and then when I clicked the X (because there was no other button to click) button on the notification, I didn't get anything. Could someone let me know what I got or if I didn't get anything and it was a false notification?

Thanks in advance,
Regards
Froz3nBlaze

replies.body: You got the Santa Baron icon.  :D  Grats!
